Package com.anotherbank.mochabank.domain.model

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anotherbank.mochabank.domain.model.Transaction
      • com.anotherbank.mochabank.domain.model.Operation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    @Entity
public final class Operation
extends Transaction
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents an operation for the Mocha Bank company.
    Author:
    Isabelle Deligniere
